page.title: 18WILDLIFE
page.content: {WILDLIFE.}OUR AREA IN DEVON IS VERY RURAL AND HAS MANY DIFFERENT WILDIFE HABITATS,INCLUDING GRASSLAND,HEDGEROWS ,WOODS,MARSHES,STREAMS AND PONDS. {TREES.}THEY ARE MOSTLY DECIDUOUS AND INCLUDE OAK,HAWTHORN,ASH,BEECH,HAZEL, SILVERBIRCH THERE IS ALSO SOME ECONOMIC CONIFFER FORRESTRY. {PLANTS.}OUR HEDGEROWS CONTAIN A LARGE VARIETY OF WILD PLANTS INCLUDING EARLY PURPLE ORCHID, PRIMROSES,DAFODILS, BULEBELLS, VIOLETS, FOXGLOVES, RAMSOUNS, HONEYSUCKLE,ALSO MANY FERNS AND FUNGI.{WILD ANIMALS.}THEY INCLUDE, GREY SQUIRRELS,FOXES,BADGERS,RABBITS, HARES,RED AND ROE DEER,MOLES,MINK, OTTERS,WEASELS,HEDGEHOGS,DORMICE, WOODMICE,SHREWS,RATS,MANY VARIETYS OF BATS,COMMON FROGS,GRASS SNAKES,TOADS, NEWTS AND LIZARDS,ADDERS SLOW WORMS.{
